text: jewellery? seriously? sheldon, you are the most shallow, self-centred person i have ever met. do you really think another transparently manip..oh! it's a tiara! a tiara! i have a tiara! put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me, put it on me.
